quiz.question: What is the primary purpose of Human Interface Guidelines (HIG) in iOS design?
options: To ensure consistency and usability across iOS applications
To limit the creativity of app designers
To provide detailed coding strategies for iOS developers
quiz.hint: Think about the role of guidelines in maintaining a uniform user experience.

quiz.question: Which principle is emphasized in Material Design for Android?
quiz.hint: Material Design focuses on mimicking real-world surfaces.

quiz.question: What is wireframing in the context of mobile UI/UX design?
options: Creating a full-color design of the application
Developing the underlying code for the app
Outlining the structure and layout of an app without detailed design
Conducting user surveys for app feedback
quiz.hint: Wireframing is about planning the skeletal framework of an app.

quiz.question: Which tool is commonly used for prototyping in mobile app design?
quiz.hint: This tool is popular among designers for creating interactive prototypes.

quiz.question: What is the main goal of usability testing in mobile app development?
options: To identify and fix usability issues before launch
To create marketing strategies for the app
quiz.hint: Usability testing focuses on improving user experience by identifying potential issues.
